text: there are lots of different techniques
for changing the way we think about the
stressful or painful situations in our
life so one set of techniques is called
distancing and that is ways of creating
distance and getting kind of vision and
perspective away from feeling like we're
in the thick of a situation where our
survival threatens integrate the one is
asking yourself what is this situation
going to do to me in my life in five
years or ten years so that's the way
it's time distancing another way visual
distancing so it's stepping back and
just viewing the situation replaying in
your mind objectively as Mystik on a
huge movie screen observing yourself in
that way as a objective observer it
changes everything your stress response
is lower you actually can process that
situation so it's less emotional for you
one of the ways to carry chronic stress
with us Ottway into the future so
something might have happened a week ago
and we're still reliving it with our per
separative or ruminative gone by kind of
reprocessing it that way using one of
these distant techniques that can let it
go to rest much more easily and we can
be fresh and in the moment mark
